description:
In the early morning on a day off school, Shuusuke heads out and meets up with the AGE Explorers so they can all go on an expedition to Akihabara - the perfect place to pick up some of their favorite goods. Nao and Iroha are not sure what exactly Shuusuke is up to, so they decide to follow him and see where he goes.
Nao is quick to notice that Shuusuke still hasn`t gotten over his black stocking fetish - he still seems to be looking out for anything with girls in stockings. But Shuusuke isn`t the only one looking for a specific fetish - all the members of the AGE Explorers each seem to have their own specific tastes, and it seems like each of them might have some trouble trying to get the others to agree which fetish is best...

titles.title: My Brother and His Friends` Akiba
